Title: Account State
Description: 'Equity' (Gesamtwert = Cash + Total_Assets), 'Cash' (Barbestand), 'Total_Assets' (Marktwert offener Positionen), 'Drawdown' (Aktueller Drawdown in EUR, negativ).
